clips.description: How to break a roll.  With rolls becoming a more common defensive strategy, this is one way to beat a roll. featuring @Dry5

An attempted poach leads to a seamless switch between players.  Notice how multiple players see the poach, and are communicating (both verbally and visually, by pointing) to make sure that all players are covered.

Handler poaching by @100percentBS (I think @BitterTwitts?). Positioning to see the disc, in ready position, able to pressure upfield and reset. As soon as thrower winds up, she is ready to move+bid and gets the D.
